original_text: If then you are not able to do as small a thing as that, why are you anxious about the rest?
korean_text: 그런즉 가장 작은 일도 하지 못하면서 어찌 다른 일들을 염려하느냐

sentences.original_text: If then you are not able to do as small a thing as that
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 만약 너희가 그렇게 작은 일이라도 할 수 없다면

sentences.original_text: why are you anxious about the rest?
